ygData.subject: Re: Sword...
ygData.msgSnippet: If all goes well, And as a brethren of the shadows, I wish you luck, so if all goes well, either post on this board the stats, or if you dont think you should
ygData.messageBody:
If all goes well, And as a brethren of the shadows, I wish you luck, so if
all goes well, either post on this board the stats, or if you dont think
you should and noone else wants to know the stats, then just email it to me
what the stats are and what it does, if any abilities.

I can probably get a group myself to take him out...
just last night, me, another SK one level ahead of me, a shaman, and a
necro took out a Cyclops....it was a vicious battle, but we won...I was lvl
19, the necro lvl 23 or 24, both the shaman and the other SK were 20...and
all the pets were let loose =)

Kael Deathwind
of The Rathe

----------
> From: JACKiam1@...
> To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
> Subject: [eq_shadowknights] Re: Sword...
> Date: Sunday, May 02, 1999 3:35 AM
>
> From: JACKiam1@...
>
> Nope, but there is an Opal Scythe on Lord Grimrot in S karanas. This is a

> magic SK and Warrior only 2 handed weapon. I've heard Lord Grim is about
> level 20-25ish and was going to take a party out to take him down this
> morning. I'll tell you how it goes, but if any of you have had experience

> with him yourself please mail me!
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
